title: Boards Event - Win Championship Thresh Skin!
body:
[FINISHED]

Winner: Phantomizer
Congrats!
App used: http://www.miniwebtool.com/random-name-picker/
**Dear Summoners,**

After reading about the new Season 6 updates, I am amazed and can't wait for the club feature and rewards for teaming up.
In reading this, I have decided I want as many people who would like to play to be on my friends list. I recently purchased the Championship Thresh figurine from the merch store, unfortunately I already own the skin...so I'll give you guys a chance to WIN it!
So here's how it goes;
To be in the draw, you **must:**
1. Add me in game (IGN: bollockz)
2. Comment on this post stating you have added me along with your IGN

**In 5 days from this post, on the 10th of November;** I will list all your names in a generator that will randomly select one of you to win.
That is all! 

_Good luck_ Summoners and thank you in advance for your participation,

Cheers

replies.body:
Thanks bollockz <3 Still, everyone else who participated, thanks for making it more dramatic :P Good luck in the future events everyone!

EDIT: Got the skin. It works and I'm one happy guy!

_**Huge**_ thanks to everyone who has participated so far!
In 22 hrs, we have received 20 participants, that's nearly 1 an hour!

What an **outstanding response** from you guys, I am very appreciative and quite amazed and how many people have come with only one source of advertisement. 

_Thank you_ **all**, and once again _good luck!_

I would like to own this skin because I am a really good thresh and I think that this skin will prove to other that I can prove something to the rest of OCE even though I'm only Silver V 0LP.

IGN: mutley.

Even though your only Silver V 0LP, what's that meant to mean? You are a legend for making it thus far! Keep up the positive attitude and it will get easier.

Thank you for participating and good luck!
I really want that skin, I am EUNE between so I added you from my OCE account.  My OCE  IGN is also vleos. {{champion:45}}
Thanks for your vote! Good luck!
And contribution! :^)

Congratulations to Phantomizer and a huge thanks to everyone for participating :)
Keep an eye out for more chances to WIN!

Added 
IGN: Aidan7787

I would love this skin! 
Good Luck Everyone!

This event is still running don't miss your chance to win for free! 

Check out my other thread if you are interested in a 5v5 tournament.
